<title level="1" pfs="">[Kiru](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1630)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Kiru](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1630)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 27</row>

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +11, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (6), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 45

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing plus knife jab

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing plus knife jab

**Knife Jab**   Creatures hit by Kiru's dagger Strike must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or become [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for 1 round (1 minute on a critical failure). If Kiru's Strike is a critical hit, the DC increases to 25.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Kiru deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Surprise Attack**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to Kiru.

</column>
name: Kiru

text: Kiru Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 28 Unspecific Lore : DC 26 Specific Lore : DC 23 Kiru Source Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 27 Perception +9; low-light vision Languages Common, Elven Skills Acrobatics +9, Intimidation +9, Stealth +9, Thievery +11, Underworld Lore +8 Str +1 Dex +4 Con +0 Int +1 Wis +2 Cha +2 Items Dagger (6), Studded Leather Armor, Thieves' Tools --- AC 20 Fort +7 Ref +11 Will +9 HP 45 --- Speed 30 feet Melee Single Action dagger +12 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 1d4+4 piercing plus knife jab Ranged Single Action dagger +12 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+4 piercing plus knife jab Knife Jab Creatures hit by Kiru's dagger Strike must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or become clumsy 1 for 1 round (1 minute on a critical failure). If Kiru's Strike is a critical hit, the DC increases to 25. Sneak Attack Kiru deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures. Surprise Attack On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are flat-footed to Kiru.
